Package dev.galasa.db2.spi

Interface IDb2ManagerSpi

public interface IDb2ManagerSpi
Db2 Manager SPI Provides either a connection to a DB or a simple connection to a schema within the DB. If the DB has not been connected too before requesting a schema from that database, the connection will be initialised.
